mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity_registration (activity_id, user_id, real_name, phone, email, message, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{activity_id}, #{user_id}, #{real_name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{message}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT ar.*, a.username, a.id as avatar, act.title as activity_title, act.start_time FROM activity_registration ar LEFT JOIN account a ON ar.user_id = a.id LEFT JOIN activity act ON ar.activity_id = act.id WHERE ar.id = #{id}
SELECT ar.*, a.username, a.id as avatar FROM activity_registration ar LEFT JOIN account a ON ar.user_id = a.id WHERE ar.activity_id = #{activityId} ORDER BY ar.create_time DESC
SELECT ar.*, act.title as activity_title, act.start_time FROM activity_registration ar LEFT JOIN activity act ON ar.activity_id = act.id WHERE ar.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ar.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE activity_registration SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
